_description: Segrestin, a miracle of the Virgin Mary in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

HunHM129.First Lines:
A blak monk was segrestayneAnd to mary was he buxum and
                    bayne…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Leuedy in hir seruyse vs spedeAnd to ihesu hir sun vs
                    lede
HunHM129.Editions:
Weir,  E. G. 
             “The Vernacular Sources of the Middle English Plays of the Virgin
                Mary.” 
         2 vols. Diss. Stanford, 1941: 1.121.
